name: Doxazosin

ingredients.name: SODIUM STARCH GLYCOLATE TYPE A POTATO

indications: Doxazosin tablets are an alpha1 adrenergic antagonist indicated for: Signs and symptoms of Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia (BPH) Treatment of Hypertension
contraindications: For the treatment of BPH: Initiate therapy at 1 mg once daily. Dose maybe titrated at 1 to 2 week intervals, up to 8 mg once daily.( 2.2 ) For the treatment hypertension: Initiate therapy at 1 mg once daily. Dose may be titrated as needed, up to 16 mg once daily. ( 2.3 )
warningsAndPrecautions:
Each doxazosin tablet, USP for oral administration contains 2 mg of
                  doxazosin as 2.426 mg of doxazosin mesylate, respectively.
                  
                  Doxazosin tablets USP, 2 mg are light pink to pink, mottled, round biconvex scored tablets
                  debossed with '784' on one side and score line on another side and are supplied as:
                  NDC 68071-3811-6 in bottle of 60 tablets with child-resistant closure
                  
                  
                     Storage:
                  
                  Store at 20째C to 25째C (68째F to 77째F) [See USP Controlled Room Temperature].
adverseReactions: The use of doxazosin tablets is contraindicated in patients with a hypersensitivity to doxazosin, other quinazolines (e.g., prazosin, terazosin), or any of its components.
